idea-plugin.name: Monochromatic-code Light
idea-plugin.description:
Monochromatic-code light syntax highlighting color scheme by Aquaticat.

Only 5 colors were used:

  1. #ffffff pure white
  2. #c0c0c0 light gray
  3. #808080 gray
  4. #404040 dark gray
  5. #000000 black

Only seeing these five colors while coding has reduced my eye strain. I hope it will help with other people's eye problems, too.

Website of the color scheme: https://code.monochromatic.dev/ (inaccessible as of 2023MAR19)

Repo of the color scheme: https://github.com/Aquaticat/monochromatic-code/ (no readme as of 2023MAR19)
